climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 👍【Unique Honeycomb Shaped Design】The honeycomb shaped design not only adds good slip resistance, but also makes you feel more comfortable and breathable, ensuring strong support. The eye-popping view makes your office chair more than ordinary and matches the office, home, study and meeting room.

👍【Perfectly Adjustable】Flip-up armrests improve flexibility for space-saving. Seat height can be adjusted between 18.9"-22". Pull the left lever to enjoy rocking from 90°-113°. With this office chair, you can relax and immerse yourself in study and gaming at your desk.

👍【Ultimate Comfort】Adopt advanced ergonomic design and preferred material. High back design and bionic spine contour help you maintain good posture and relieve pressure. The headrest is thickened in three layers and the seat cushion is wider and double-padded to provide long-lasting support.

👍【Reliable Quality】Thick bonded and skin-friendly leather material provides soft-touch. A strong integrated metal frame and heavy-duty nylon base allow the chair to withstand up to 300 pounds. Class 3 gas lift cylinder provides a more safer protection. Upgraded large caliber nylon casters are more solid and quiet.

👍【Risk Free Purchase】BUY WITH CONFIDENCE! The chair can be easily installed and ready for use in about 10-15 minutes. All parts of the office chair are backed by a 1-year warranty. If anything goes wrong, contact the manufacturer as written in the manual instructions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: COLAMY---Dedicated to planting roots in your dream land.

Special Features Unique Honeycomb Shaped Design Go with any kind of room. Ergonomic Design Headrest Bring you stronger support. Three Layer Thickened Headrest A better fit for your head. Waterfall Edge Seat Release pressure on the thigh.

Adjustable Height & Tilt Lock Seat height range : 18.9"-22" Rocking Back and Forth Reclining Angle : 90° -110° Upgraded Mute Casters 360° smooth-rolling casters offer more flexibility. Flip-up Padded Armrests Allow chair to be placed under any desk.

SPECIFICATION Chair Size : 28.3’'W x 29.5''D x 45.3-48.4‘’H Seat Size : 22''W x 19.7''D x 5.3''T Seat Height : 18.9" - 22''H Weight Capacity : ≤ 300LBS Reclining Angle : 90° -110° Color : Black & Ivory

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Comfy Executive Office Chair :)
reviews.reviewText: This ergonomic, comfy executive chair with movable arms is very comfortable and effective for relieving back strain. The chair is well-made, elegant, ensuring durability. It comes with all necessary parts and easy to setup.Overall this office chair is with stylish design and the leather surface has a good appearance and feel and providing good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Gifted to my husband for Christmas. Loves it. Very nice looking chair,comfortable and I love the wheels. Roll across room if you’re not careful. Easy as could be to assemble. At 66 years old took under 30 minutes to do it by myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, Easy to Assemble but Casters are disappointing.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This product came packaged well and was easy to assemble. The instructions were clear and have diagrams to quickly assist you in building. A second person is helpful in aligning and screwing the back on; but not required. That was the hardest part of assembly.Overall the chair is very comfortable. I like that it's a wider and thicker seat than most. It tilts back. The armrests lift up - which is nice if you don't want to use them while sitting or to push the chair under a desk. The height adjustment is nice. I think short and tall people will find an appropriate sitting height given it''s options. My 5'2" mother felt comfortable in it. It feels solid. I'm 5"11 and 330lbs and I feel comfortable in this chair after 8 hours of working from home in it. It does not feel cheap. I wear an insulin pump in my pocket and I was worried about getting in and out of the chair and having enough space to not grab at my pocket pump, and that issue does not exist. It's' great!My only complaint is that the upgraded casters do not glide very easily on carpet as advertised. It would easily glide on business/commercial grade carpet, but not average carpet inside a home/home office. They do work very well on hardwood/solid surfaces. They are a nicer caster than most chairs. I would, and will rebuy this chair. I'm purchasing another when they go on sale again for my other office desk.I would recommend this chair to anyone, especially larger individuals. Its sits well. It's also attractive in design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Assembly is a one man job, really easy.
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable, well engineered, comes with easy to follow instructions, no problems assembling, what not to love!?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable, built to be durable and easy to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: I rarely write reviews but felt compelled to write one for this products. The assembly instructions were easy to understand and follow (amazing). They even give you extra parts. I needed one cap as I hit one too hard and cracked it. Hope to get many years of service out of this piece of furniture. I am especially impressed with the quality and seeming durability of the casters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the wheels, they are super quiet and move around smoothly. Very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars weird design flaw - makes this a 3 star chair
reviews.reviewText: The original chair would not tilt (rock) at all. Contacted the company and after sending them some photos, they advised they would send a replacement seat plate part. I finally got the replacement part after a weather related delivery delay, and after some struggle to get the base off gas lift I was able to get the replacement plate installed. When first using the chair with the new part it still would not tilt/rock. After some testing I finally got the chair to rock but ONLY if the seat height is not all the way up!Very strange. I'm not fully satisfied with the chair, for for now I do find it acceptable.Needless to say, I won't be getting another item from this company due to this design flaw.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars so far it seems pretty good
reviews.reviewText: we purchased 2 of these, 1st received on the 1-10-24, seemed pretty good, the wife liked it, let her have it. i purchased a different chair for 2x the cost, was defective (NOT COLAMY), 100 bucks on me to return. so i went and purchased a 2nd one of these chairs, seat is a little stiff, might need additional seat cushion but its ok. i will try to update this in a few months and let ya know how it holds up.
